name: Queer Identities (2020), Group Exhibition
description:
Welcome to IC Contemporary's second digital exhibition: Queer Identities (2020).

Featured in this space is Chase Joynt, Devin Wesley, Joslyn Panasiuk, B. G-Osborne, Reitano Holly, and Shane Oosterhoff.

Due to film involved in this exhibition, the exhibition is only available on your Mac or PC.  A virtual reality experience of this space is coming soon. 

Click here for a pre-recorded tour of the space that is mobile friendly.

Any donations towards this project help fund our artists and build larger and better exhibitions. More information on this exhibit can be found at www.coltnicastro.com/queer-identities

* DISCLAIMER *

The digital gallery is not operational for mobile or virtual reality use 

The program may take some time to load due to the size of the file 

The films take some time to sync with audio, but we are working on a more seamless experience
